Uses of BufferFactory in net.philsprojects.io.buffer
 

Classes in net.philsprojects.io.buffer that implement BufferFactory
 class AbstractBufferFactory
          An abstract implementation of a BufferFactory.
 class BufferFactoryBinary
          A BufferFactory where all cached buffers have a power-of-2 size within a range, defined by powers.
 class BufferFactoryDirect
          A BufferFactory which does not cache and uses DirectByteBuffers.
 class BufferFactoryFixed
          A BufferFactory where the buffers allocated all have the same size.
 class BufferFactoryHeap
          A BufferFactory which does not cache and uses HeapByteBuffers.
 class BufferFactoryMap
          Works best when application only requests a known subset of buffer sizes opposed to a crazy combination of sizes.
